subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The objective of the Project is an initiation of legal process on formation of Republic of Tajikistan’s positions with regard to international legal documents regulating water relations, in order to develop mutual understanding, partnership and reduce risk of conflict situations on the ground of water utilization and management. This would promote effective management of water resources, and in general, provide for water security, which is an important link to regional and global security.
subproject.title: Positioning of RT in Water Law

subproject.title: Capacity Building for CDM TJK

title: Capacity Building in the area of Environment
